K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-1: buddha bha ga w'an aashta sha ta n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-5: bcom ldan 'das snying rje'i tsandan dri zhim po'i spos chus byugs pa'i sku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-7: lha ma yin gyi nor bu'i cod pan gyis gtugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-8: rang byung sel mdzad bla ma 'jig rten la phan par mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-9: ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa nyes pa dang bral pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-12: mtshan gsal ba'i gzi brjid can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-13: sku dpe byad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-14: yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-15: padma rgyas pa ltar zhal bzhad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-16: tshems dkar zhing snyoms la thags bzang bas rab tu rgyas shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-17: snang la nor bu dri ma med pa ltar 'od gsal zhing mdzes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47a-18: spa zhing gsal ba la nyi ma 'od zer stong 'bar ba mang po'i 'od snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zil gyis gnon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-0: thub @47b pa'i mchog stobs bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-11: ta th'a ga ta aa nu ga ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-16: aa bi ra la ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-25: bha b'an ta ka su ra ta bho ga ma h'a sh'anti ka ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-26: p'a ba ki lbe sha n'a sha ka sv'a h'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-27: de nas dpe byad mtshan gsal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-28: yan lag thams cad rab brgyan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-29: nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-31: grags shing dri ma rab spangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-32: dri med skyon bral chos kyi blo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-33: khyab bdag chen po stobs bcur ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-34: rdul bral dpal dang ldan pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-35: rin chen sa gzhi chen po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-36: pho brang rtse mo rdo rje'i rtse //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-37: rgyal ba'i sras rnams gnas gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-38: nor bu du ma rab 'phro zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-39: 'od zer dri med gsal bkod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-40: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor pho brang na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-41: thub pa'i longs spyod sa gzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-42: seng ge'i khri rten yangs la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-43: nor bu dbyig gi sa gzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-44: khri chen rab spa de nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-45: de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-46: phun sum tshogs pa rgyan bkod lta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-47: thub pa me zla nor bu'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:47b-48: nyi zer non pa'i 'od ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-2: 'od gsal skyil mo krung bcas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-4: 'od gsal rgyas pas thub dbang gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-5: dri med 'od zer bkye ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-6: mi g-yo rdo rje can zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-7: dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-8: rdo rje can dag rab 'dul ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-9: gang yin de kun dag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-10: dkyil 'khor dri med skor bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-11: ngan song dam tshig dri ma kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-12: legs par shin tu dag pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-13: srid gsum dkyil 'khor rgya che la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-14: rnam pa du mar 'od gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-16: bkod nas bde chen rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-17: rdo rje ral gri thogs pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-18: cod pan ma g-yos nang du zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-19: de nas 'jigs pa'i sgra skad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-21: rig sngags h'um zhes sgrogs pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-23: bzhin mdzes 'dzum gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-24: sdig med mig rtsa rgod gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-25: stan las langs te phyag 'tshal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-26: legs par mchod byas smras pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-27: kye ma skye ba'i phyogs 'joms shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-28: bskal pa du ma'i dri ma sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-29: rig sngags yon tan sgrub byed pa; ;thub mchog rnams kyis rab tu gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-30: de gzigs dge ba du ma brnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-31: sangs rgyas blo gros rgyas par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48a-32: byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-0: bskal ba @48b gcig tu spyod pas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-1: rgyud mar sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-2: spyod pa du ma 'byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-3: yon tan brgya yi spos ldan 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-4: thos pa spro bar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-5: longs spyod rgya mtsho chen po can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-6: byang chub sems mchog dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-7: rgyal mchog rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-8: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos chen ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-9: 'di thos sangs rgyas spyod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-10: sems can kun gyi sdig pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-11: ma lus rab tu bsal nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-12: blo gros dri ma med par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-13: zhi zhing dag byed bkra shis la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-14: rdul med brgyan te zhi bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-15: dge zhing mya ngan thams cad sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-16: sdug bsngal thams cad nges par 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-17: dbang byed gsang sngags dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-18: sa steng sdig pa thams cad sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-19: ma smad 'bras bu nges par sbyin; ;bstan pa yin te sdang ba 'dul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-20: nyes pa byas pa sel ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-21: gzungs 'di gang gis thos gyur des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-22: sangs rgyas rnyed par dka' ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-23: ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-24: sgrib pa thams cad rab zhi zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-25: khyab bdag nyon mongs kun sel ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-26: gang zhig nyon mongs zhi byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-28: kun tu bzang po nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-29: lag na rdo rje nyid kyang 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-30: rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:48b-32: 'jig rten kun la lha ma me ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-2: dkyil 'khor dam pa gting med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-3: 'di ni ji srid ma gsan par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-4: rab zhi nyon mongs 'dul ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-5: rang byung go 'phang ma brnyes te; ;rnam par dag phyir gsan gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-6: gsan ma thag tu rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-7: de phyir phun sum tshogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-8: legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-9: gzhan gyis mi thub gzungs gsan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-10: thub pa kun gyis gang brnyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-12: bdud kyi las dang 'khrug med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-13: mya ngan med cing 'thab med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-15: gnas kyi dam pa thob nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-16: thub pa dri ma med pa'i blo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-17: gzigs pa bzang rnams gar gshegs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-19: legs par 'dod pa rnams kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-20: tshig gi mdo 'di mnyan par bgyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-21: nyon mongs zad par bya ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-22: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gzungs 'di mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-23: sdig pa byed cing dge la sdang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-24: sdig pa'i rang bzhin rab 'jungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-25: gang gis thos nas de spang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-27: sdig pa gzhan yang mi bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-28: snga ma rnams kyang bshags par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-29: gzungs mchog 'di yi mthu stobs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49a-31: tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-0: tshe @49b 'phos bye ba phrag brgyar yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-1: sdig pa mi dge gang byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-3: yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-4: de bzhin tshes ni bco lnga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-5: bsnyen gnas legs par lhur blangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-6: cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-7: de nas rmongs pa med par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-8: nyon mongs dgra ni rab 'joms shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-9: shin tu thub dka' dpe med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-10: nyes pa zlog pa'i gzungs brjod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-11: thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-13: de nas tshogs rnams rdzogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-14: rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-15: 'od dpag med la mnga' ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-16: yon tan mtha' yas rab brgyan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-17: bskal pa bye ba stong du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-18: mtha' mi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-19: de nas rdo rje 'chang gi tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-20: dkyil 'khor dag na gnas rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-21: thos nas rgyan rnams sna tshogs ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-22: bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-23: rdo rje ral gri la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-24: lha bdag gsal ba thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-25: ri bo ti se ri rab la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-26: gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-27: de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-29: ma la ya yi ri bo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-30: gnas shing rgyan 'bar thogs rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-31: khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-32: lha yi bdag po rnams dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:49b-33: lag na rdo rje la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-0: byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen @50a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-2: nor bu'i dpung rgyan rna cha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-3: rgyan rnams rab tu g-yo ba'i lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-4: rab tu bskyod de langs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-5: sdig bral mnga' bdag rgyal ba la; ;phyag btsal thal mo sbyar byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-6: kun gyis sa yi dbang phyug bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-7: thub mchog dam pa de la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-8: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-9: mnyam nyid chos de de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-10: shin tu rtogs pa lam me ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-11: dul ba brtan pa dri ma sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-12: dri ma med pa skyon bral ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-13: thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu zhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-14: 'jig rten mgon po skye dgu'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-16: de bzhin rgyal ba rdul bsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-17: ston pa ston mdzad brtan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-18: sdig pa med pa rdul dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-19: 'jig rten mgon po snang mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-20: dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-21: nyon mongs rab bcom phan 'dogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-22: ston pa po ste dri ma sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-23: spyod tshul dri med tshul bzang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-24: zab pa rnam par gnon pa brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-25: btsan po thugs brtse rnam par rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-26: mgon po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-27: zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-28: bcings pa las grol nges par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-30: bdag gir mi 'dzin dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-31: nyon mongs sel ba dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50a-32: dpal mdzad de bzhin phan mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-0: mnyam pa med @50b pa dpe med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-1: khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams spong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-2: khengs pa med pa dman pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-3: mnyam pa de bzhin mi mnyam mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-4: snang ba brnyes pa snang byed med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-5: 'jig rten snang mdzad sdig med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-6: sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-7: 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-8: dpa' bo zhi ba zhi mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-9: nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-10: mnga' bdag thabs mkhyen thabs che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-12: don yod rnyed dka' blo dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-13: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thub par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-14: skyob pa 'jigs sel tshangs pa ste; ;de bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-15: dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-16: gzugs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-17: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-18: chos kyi longs spyod rgya mtsho lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-19: dpe byad bzang po bkod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-20: spras pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-21: dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-22: de bzhin des pa bde sbyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-23: mthu chen yangs ba rgya che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-24: bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams sel mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-25: brtson chen spro ba che ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-26: dgyes pa chen po stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-27: mthu brnyes bstan pa chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-28: gnas ldan dbang gis dar ba lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-29: gsal ba gsung ldan dpe med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-30: dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-31: rab tu zhi ba mun pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:50b-32: blo gros chen po chos 'dzin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-3: dpal mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-4: dpal gyi longs spyod shin tu rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-5: bcom ldan legs bsgos bsgo bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-6: gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-7: mnyam nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-8: mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan dpag med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-9: rab tu dgyes la longs spyod gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-10: gzhi bcas sems pa mnyam pa lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-11: blo dag blo ldan dri ma spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-12: gnas chen brtan par ldan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-13: rgyas par longs spyod dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-14: thub pa thugs rje'i rgyan mnga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-15: bskal pa bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-16: de bzhin 'jigs med nyon mongs sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-17: dri med skyon bral longs spyod can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-19: sku bzang dag pa rig ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-21: mi gnas longs spyod dam ba lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-22: chos kyi rgyu ste yon tan gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-23: rjed 'os mchog gnas longs spyod che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-24: nam mkha'i mtshan te rnam dag blo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-25: rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-26: khyu mchog che spyan ba rdzi ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-27: rgyal ba skyon bsal shes rab can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-28: shes rab thabs dang ldan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51a-30: dag par longs spyod brtan pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-0: sa dang stobs dang ye @51b shes bzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-1: pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-2: ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-3: rnam par sgo la mngon sum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-4: stong pas sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-5: chos chen bde bar 'char ba lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-6: thams cad mkhyen ba yul las 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-7: spyod yul sgrib pa mi mnga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-9: dam pa'i don te tshul che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-10: shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-11: sgrib pa med par 'char ba brnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-12: rigs chen mthun par skyes pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-14: khyad par brnyes pa mnyam nyid brnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-15: mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-16: don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-17: nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-18: dge sbyong sdig pa sbyong mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-19: gnod pa med par bde bar 'byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-20: blo rgya che ba thams cad mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-21: thos pa'i mtshon cha ma lus gsan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-22: dkon pa bde bar thob 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-23: mnyam pa khyad par yul dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-24: 'jig rten thams cad dar mdzad mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-25: zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-26: bsam gyis mi khyab bsam yas yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-27: dpe med pa ste dper bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-28: 'od bzang rab dgyes dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-29: legs gsung blo yi stobs kyis 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-30: mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-31: rab dgyes 'das pa'i spyod yul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:51b-32: gsung ba chen po ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-0: @52a *// gnas chen bkra shis chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-1: mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-2: bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-3: sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-4: shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-5: kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-7: kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-8: thabs mkhas phun sum tshogs ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-9: rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i thabs dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-10: chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-11: rab ston yon tan sgyur mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-12: spyod pa ma lus 'dul bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-13: yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-14: sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-15: bgegs byed ma legs byed pa bcom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-16: bdud kyi dregs pa sel bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-17: g-yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba brnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-18: dpa' bo chen po pham med stobs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-19: theg pa chen po'i shing rta bcibs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-20: blo chen brgal bar dka' ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-21: nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i pha rol gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-22: theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-23: theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-24: nyan thos 'das pa'i spyod yul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-25: rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-26: sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bur gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-27: gong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-28: khyod ni nam mkha'i gnas na bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-29: bde 'byung sa dang zhing rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52a-30: mtsho chen dag la longs par spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-0: sangs rgyas dbang @52b po rgyas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-1: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-2: de la lha sogs tshogs rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-3: phyag byas mgo smad phyogs gcig 'khod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-4: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-5: gnas pa ma lus chem mer 'khod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-6: thod du rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-7: langs nas cod pan rab tu g-yos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-8: dkyil 'khor mthon po thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-9: skad ber chen por yongs bkang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-10: nor bu'i rgyan ni rnam g-yo zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-11: ha ha grags pa'i sgra sgrogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-12: kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-13: bskal pa grangs med gsum bsags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-14: byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-15: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-16: kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-17: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-18: gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-20: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-21: bcom ldan 'das drung brjod na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-22: sgrib dang kun nas nyon mongs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-23: sdig pa thams cad dag pa thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-24: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-25: sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-26: nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-27: shes rab che ba nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-28: de ni longs spyod chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-29: bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-30: de ni tshe rabs thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-31: blo ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-32: de nas rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:52b-33: yon tan mtha' yas sras de la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-0: @53a *// bcom ldan bdud las rgyal pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-1: mngon sum gzigs nas bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-2: rgyal ba'i sa 'di zhi ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-3: nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-5: de bzhin gshegs bde mngon du phyogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-6: gzhan gyi mi tshugs gzungs dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-7: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-8: de dag rnam dag bdag nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-9: sems can kun la bde 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-10: lan gcig thos pa tsam gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-11: de dag sa chen 'bras bur gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-12: ring por mi thogs dga' 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-13: 'chang sogs lta la ci zhig smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-14: de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrims la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-15: gtan du bde ba 'dod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-16: yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-17: mnyan par bya zhing bcang par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-18: gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-19: bdag nyid kyis kyang bton na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-21: gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-22: 'di ni yon tan kun gyi snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-23: dge ba phun sum tshogs sbyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-24: kun mkhyen 'bras bu bla med mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-25: bde 'byung thob par byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-26: 'bras bu 'byor pa ci yang rung; ;thob par mi 'gyur dogs pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53a-27: kun mkhyen go 'phang thob gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53b-0: sangs @53b rgyas sa yi 'bras bu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53b-1: yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53b-2: snying rje dri ma med sbyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53b-3: 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53b-4: 'jig rten kun gnas dga' ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-021:53b-7: ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
